extendedInfo.description: If you were looking for some free science magazine subscriptions, then here comes the perfect free science magazine android app for you that allow you to have a watch at the sciencedaily news right through your mobile phone.Following features are included in the app.â¢	Many blogs and articles related to  science magazine free download are linked directly to the app,â¢	The app provides you with fair information on various articles for science magazines.â¢	No internet connection is required to have an access over the app.â¢	Easy and fast way to know about various science related magazines.DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is collected using Feeds and Videos are hosted by YouTube and all are available in public domain. We have not uploaded any videos to YouTube. Apps are fetching the data from RSS feeds of different sites.This app provides an organized way to browse, read contents and watch YouTube Videos.
